title: Is it cruel to play Ranked?
body:
Personally, I'm not that good. But honestly, I feel like if I don't play Ranked, I'll just play like its normals every game ever, and a little bit better on Ranked. So it feels like I have to play more Ranked to get good at Ranked, because normal games you have people always feedin' and screwing around and saying "its just a game", and I can't get any serious practice, but I feel like if I do play Ranked and lose the game because of me, I'm screwing over the other four people playing with me.

Should I play Ranked, or hold out?
